Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of L-Ornithine-L-Aspartate in a Rat Model of Hind Limb Ischemia

Intervention.evidence: randomly assigned to three groups: control (normal saline), sorbitol, and LOLA

Objective.evidence: This study investigates the potential of L-Ornithine-L-Aspartate (LOLA) to enhance angiogenesis and perfusion in a rat model of hind limb ischemia (HLI).

Method_Outcome.evidence: Perfusion imaging was performed on PODs 7 and 14

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation was stratified by body weight

Blinding.evidence: outcome assessors were blinded to group allocation
